archimate:Device.name: Thin Clients (TCL)
archimate:Device.documentation:
These systems will support digital training sessions, virtual application access, and video-based instruction in the hospital’s training rooms. The package includes a high-resolution, large-format display and a reliable thin client that can connect to VDI environments and browser-based platforms.
• Form Factor: Compact desktop or mini-PC thin client VESA mountable on the back of the monitor or placed on the desk with included stand
Thin Client Specifications:
• Processor: Quad-core x86 processor (e.g., Intel Celeron J6412, AMD Ryzen Embedded R1505G, or equivalent) • Memory (RAM): Minimum 16 GB DDR4 • Storage: 128 GB SSD or eMMC (internal storage for OS and cache) • Graphics: Integrated GPU capable of 1080p and 4K video decoding Supports dual displays • Video Outputs: 2 x DisplayPort or HDMI Support for dual 1920×1080 monitors (at minimum) • Networking: 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet + Wi-Fi 6E Bluetooth 5.0 for flexible placement and wireless peripherals • USB Ports: Minimum 4 total (at least 2 x USB 3.0) Support for peripherals such as mouse, keyboard, webcam, headset • Audio: 3.5mm audio jack for headphone/headset Internal speaker USB headset support • Operating System: Windows 10 IoT Enterprise, Windows 11 IoT, or Linux-based thin client OS Must support Citrix, VMware Horizon, Microsoft RDP, and web browser-based platforms • Management: Centralized device management support • Security: TPM 2.0 + FIDO2 Authentication (USB Security Key Support) Secure boot USB port control and lockdown options Kensington lock slot • Power: 100–240V AC adapter Power consumption ≤ 15W • Environment: Fanless or low-noise design Operating temperature: 0°C to 40°C Humidity: 10–90% non-condensing • Accessories: Wired USB keyboard and mouse VESA mount bracket (if applicable) • 2. Monitor Specifications • Display Size: Minimum 27 inches (measured diagonally) • Resolution: 1920 × 1080 (Full HD) minimum Preferred: 2560 × 1440 (QHD) for greater workspace clarity • Panel Type: IPS (In-Plane Switching) for wide viewing angles and color accuracy Anti-glare coating • Refresh Rate: 60 Hz or higher • Brightness: 250–300 nits • Inputs: 2 x HDMI or DisplayPort (to match thin client output) VGA (for legacy compatibility) • Adjustability: Tilt adjustment required : Height, swivel, and pivot adjustment • Mounting: VESA compatible (100 × 100 mm) for mounting of the thin client on rear • Speakers: Integrated speakers • Power: 100–240V AC Energy Star certified or equivalent
